General.Name: Angel Yeast Co Ltd
General.Description: Angel Yeast Co., Ltd engages in the production and sale of yeast and yeast derivatives in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers baking products, including baker's yeast, bread improver, premixes, and other baking ingredients; Chinese dimsum and seasoning products; and yeast extract-savoury products. The company also provides nutritional and health products comprising nutritional and probiotics yeast, yeast actives, fortified yeast, biosynthetic ingredients, tea products, and dietary supplements; and animal and plant nutrition products. In addition, it offers distilled spirits and biofuels; fermented nutrients; and enzymes. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Yichang, the People's Republic of China.
